TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. I am a phoenix.

I wish for the corruptor of this wish to be corrupted.

Granted, every wish is either corrupted or granted, so you die for wishing my wish to be corrupted.

I wish my Mun rocket would work and have enough delta-v

Granted, but it makes it only to orbit, then explodes.

I wish less people would hate on PlayStation.

Granted, but now they hate on the PlayStation 2, 3, and 4. They then buy an Xbox, Xbox 360, and a Xbox One, and Microsoft then proceeds to get all of teh moniez.

I wish that the Earth was Kerbin sized.

Granted. We have severe difficulty adapting to the new gravity and the atmosphere leaves as we have no enough gravity.

I wish to land on the sun and not burn or die.

Granted. You sink through the surface and fall permanently unconscious due to the heat.

I wish space was easy.

Granted. Typing space on keyboard is now much easier than before.

I wish I can space by myself without needing anything, and without me suffering from side effects.

Granted. [insert a witty corruption here]

I wish I was Megamind.

Granted, but now you are unable to make corruptions.

I wish space was of a typical difficulty characteristic of space.

Granted, but now a typical difficulty characteristic of space is an impossible difficulty.

I wish that I had some Bonk! Atomic Punch.

granted you accidentally puch yourself i

i wish that it was cheaper to go in a glider

Granted. The prices are halved, but so are the gliders.

I wish gas giants were as easy to colonize as they are in Endless Space.

Granted, But they transform into a black hole.

i wish for Kerbals to be real.

Gratnted, but they are on the other side of the universe

I wish for a pie.

granted they multiply and take over the earth

i wish for the universe to turn into a true vaccuum by vacuum decay (i WANT the universe to die) heheehehehe

EDIT:crud snipped wait it still works YEAH

Granted. You just destroyed a scale model of the universe.

I wish you noticed I have ninja'd you.

granted my answer still worked

i wish for the REAL universe to turn into a pure vaccum

Granted, it turns into a vacuum cleaner.

I wish that Europa melted.

Granted, you are killed by scientists as they believe Europa had life on it and now they can't prove it.

I wish to own all the planes from WW2

Granted, but they are all squeezed into a small duffel bag. When you open it, you get decapitated from the force of all of them flying () out of the bag.

I wish that Elvis was a Beatle.

Granted. The Beatles never got popular because now they sucked.

I wish I knew how to speak more languages. Five aren't nearly enough.

Granted, you speak all languages but you have no brain capacity to do anything other than speak in all the languages.

I wish to be able to learn a language.

Granted. The language you learn is Old Prussian, meaning that nobody can understand you.

I wish Encaladus orbited earth at the same distance as the moon.

Granted. the moon and Encaladus eventually collide, ruining the tides and the earth.

I wish for her:

Granted. The two aren't synchronized, and crash into each other. This creates a cataclysmic debris event, the end of life on earth, and some really cool jumps.

EDIT: Granted. Turns out, she's a he.

I wish there was a high-thrust high-isp thruster so we could get far quickly.
